definition[0]: used when explaining or giving an example of something, or when pausing to think about what you are going to say next
example[0]: You’re more of an expert than me. I mean, you’ve got all that experience.
example[1]: It’s just not right. I mean, it’s unfair isn’t it?
definition[1]: used to quickly correct something you have just said
example[2]: She plays the violin, I mean the viola, really well.
